          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Mocsári kardvirág</string>
            <string language="en-US">Marsh gladiolus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sumpf Gladiolus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gladiolus de marais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tipo de flor do pântano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gladiolus della palude</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Gladiolus έλους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gladiolo del pantano</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A mocsári kardvirág (Gladiolus palustris) legnagyobb ismert állománya a Kiskunságban él</string>
            <string language="en-US">The biggest known substance of the marsh gladiolus (Gladiolus palustris) lives in the Kiskunság</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">növénytan</string>
            <string language="en-US">botany</string>
          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die größte bekannte Substanz des Sumpf Gladiolus
(Gladiolus palustris) wohnt im Kiskunság</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La plus grande substance connue du gladiolus de 
marais (palustris de gladiolus) habite dans le Kiskunság</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A substância sabida a mais grande do tipo de 
flor do pântano (palustris do tipo de flor) vive no Kiskunság</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La sostanza conosciuta più grande del gladiolus 
della palude (palustris del gladiolus) vive nel Kiskunság</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μεγαλύτερη γνωστή ουσία του gladiolus έλους 
(palustris Gladiolus) ζει στο Kiskunsαg</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La sustancia sabida más grande del gladiolo del 
pantano (palustris del gladiolo) vive en el Kiskunság</string>
          </description>
